content: The world feels so empty, when one only sees mountains, rivers and cities. But realising that there are people here and there, who could match with us, who we live with silently : that changes this earth in a living garden.
translations: ita:Il mondo sembra così vuoto, quando uno vede solo le montagne, i fiumi e le città. Realizzare che ci sono persone quà e l
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by GeeZ (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
